gui.saving.ImageSet

Class SingleImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • gui.saving.ImageSet.SingleImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener

    public class SingleImage
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener
    The Class SingleImage contains the image and its dimension to be shown in panel.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
